item.title: SVG Wrapper
item.description: SVG Wrapper Wrap SVG with dark/bright color styles, it’s useful for dark mode compatibility. Usage {{< svg-wrapper "link" >}} svg inline {{< /svg-wrapper >}} Paramters: link: Render link for svg Examples 1 2 3 {{< svg-wrapper "https://github.com/kaiiiz/hugo-theme-graytr" >}} <svg role="img" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><title>GitHub icon</title><path d="M12 .297c-6.63 0-12 5.373-12 12 0 5.303 3.438 9.8 8.205 11.385.6.113.82-.258.82-.577 0-.285-.01-1.04-.015-2.04-3.338.724-4.042-1.61-4.042-1.61C4.422 18.07 3.633 17.7 3.633 17.7c-1.087-.744.084-.729.084-.729 1.205.084 1.838 1.236 1.838 1.
